review: It's not fair to compare this to Roku or Apple TV without putting the most significant feature on the comparison chart. Roku and Apple TV don't need a 3rd device to function. Chromecast is worthless without another internet device to connect to.Having said that, it has it's advantages. Being able to browse your device for the next cast while a cast is still playing full screen is a nice feature. I would give it four or five stars if it stood on what's truly unique about it and didn't compare itself to Roku or Apple TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: We have owned it for nearly a year and we use it everyday. We love it, because we watch our favorite shows on tv and we also listen to music from our tv. The good thing is that the number of applications that connect to tv using chromecast is increasing.
